"Is distal hereditary motor neuropathy, type V inherited ?","This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder.  Some people who have the altered gene never develop the condition, a situation known as reduced penetrance.",GHR,"distal hereditary motor neuropathy, type V"
